0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: Boo will not permit himself to be held by you any longer, Shadowheart.
0.context: NodeContext: Cheeky. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar

2.speaker: Minsc
2.text: He fears you will sacrifice him in some Sharran ritual of dark oils and leather.
2.context: NodeContext: Cheeky. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Oh, he's far too precious for that. I'll go find a comely barmaid or guardsman instead.
1.context: NodeContext: Cheeky. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar
